title: ðŸš¨Refactor: Applying the  SOLID Principles, best practices and document the code.
body:
I have refactored the code by applying SOLID principles and following industry best practices. Additionally, I have documented the code thoroughly to improve its readability and maintainability.

These changes aim to make the codebase more modular and easier to extend or modify in the future. I believe this will help the community contribute more effectively by simplifying the process of adding new features or extending existing functionality.

I hope you find these improvements beneficial, and I look forward to any feedback you may have.
author: Galileo103

comments.body: Thanks @Galileo103 we do appreciate it our team will look at that and provide you with feedback.
